title: Reported Speech - Yes-no Questions 1
instructions: Put the sentences into reported speech.
exa:
Do you need this pen?
He asked if I needed that pen.
Are you sleeping?
She asked me if I was sleeping.

alters: if my boss would fire me.

contents.longsent: Are you waiting for the rain?
alters: if I was waiting for the rain.

contents.longsent: Did you say good-bye to George?
alters: if I had said good-bye to George.

contents.longsent: Have you ever got an electric shock?
alters: if I had ever got an electric shock.

contents.longsent: Can you give me a lift to the station?
alters: if I could give him a lift to the station.

contents.longsent: Were you jogging in the park at 5?
alters: if I had been jogging in the park at 5.

contents.longsent: Have you put the baby to bed?
alters: if she had put the baby to bed.

contents.longsent: Are you going to buy a new car?
alters: if I was going to buy a new car.
